articles.title: What Marquez learned from his best Ducati ride yet - The Race
articles.description: Marc Marquez followed up his worst day and a half as a Ducati MotoGP rider with arguably his best race performance on the Desmosedici yet - converting 13th on the Le Mans sprint grid to a second-place race finish
